extendedInfo.description: Start trading binary options, less than 5 min!EZTrader has made online options trading straight forward and simple for all traders. Binary options trading with us can provide a potential 95% return in just one trade, when the option expires "in the money".EZTrader - the revolutionary binary options trading house now goes mobile!!Today, you can trade options at your convenience on any smart phone. Our mobile application allows you to take part in the exciting arena of Binary Options at any time and any place!A simple trading concept just turned even simpler! Just select from over 80 financial assets and choose your binary options trading strategy - either Call or Put. Now, you can follow your account balance and open trades from everywhere.All your favorite features are in your mobile:100% Free â No Hidden FeesLarge Selection of Global AssetsFast and Advanced Trading PlatformFree charts for your convenience24/7 customer supportEnter the world of binary options trading by visiting our binary options trading guide, traders magazine and help pages at www.EZTrader.com.Keywords: binary options,trade binary options, binary options trading, how to trade binary options, options trading,trading, option trading, binary options, mobile trading, call option, put option, binary options trading, forex trading, forex android, trading on android, trading from android.
